 PREV   NEXT FRAMES    NO FRAMES    
Packages
client The client package contains all of the client-specific code.
message The message package contains classes that are used to pass information between the server and client.
server The server package contains everything that is specific to the server.
server.connection The server.connection package contains the Communicable interface and its concrete subtypes, which are used by the server.
server.response The server.response package contains all of the ServerResponses..
server.universe The server.universe package contains everything about the virtual world, but not things relating to other parts of the server.
server.universe.item The server.universe.item package contains Item and all of its subtypes.
server.universe.mob The server.universe.mob package contains MOB, all of its subtypes, as well as BehaviorStrategy and DialogStrategy classes that MOBs use.
util The util package contains miscellaneous utility classes that might be useful to the server or th client.
